thought: I am currently holding a diamond pickaxe, which can be used to break end_stone. I see an end_stone block at location (12, 4, -13), so I will move towards it. Once I reach the block, I will break it and collect the resulting end_stone. Then, I will place 2 end_stones in the crafting grid to create 4 end_stone bricks, which I will use to craft the end_stone brick stairs.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
